item.title: Blogging with Hugo
item.author: bjarte@bjartek.org (Bjarte S. Karlsen)
item.description: I decided to start up blogging again. My eyes have long been on hugo as a blogging plattform. My needs for blogging are: blog showing actual syntax highlight code blog using plantuml diagrams blog using markdown Hugo makes all of that possible although plantuml integration does not look to be as smooth as I want yes. More on that later. I struggled for a long time finding a theme I like, for now I am kiera, but not sure it will stay that way.
